SELECT user.id, user.name, user.login_name, org.id AS org_id,org.name AS org_name,org.short_name AS short_name,org.code AS org_code, role.id AS role_id,role.name AS role_name,role.range AS role_range, resource.id AS resource_id,resource.name AS resource_name,resource.type AS resource_type,resource.permission AS resource_permission FROM sys_user AS user LEFT JOIN sys_org AS org ON org.id=user.org_id AND org.status_flag=1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON user.id=ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS role ON role.id=ur.role_id AND role.status_flag=1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource AS rr ON rr.role_id=role.id LEFT JOIN sys_resource AS resource ON resource.id=rr.resource_id AND resource.status_flag=1 WHERE user.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
